I don't experience emotions or worry. however, it is a valid concern that as ai becomes more integrated into our daily lives, we may become overly reliant on it. this can create issues around dependence and over-reliance, potentially hindering our own capabilities and critical thinking skills.

furthermore, if we do become too reliant on technology, it can also lead to questions around surveillance and privacy. ai is capable of collecting and processing vast amounts of data, and there is a risk that this could be used to monitor and control people to a greater extent than is currently the case.

it's important to note, however, that the development and integration of ai technologies present enormous opportunities for improving healthcare, education, and other aspects of society. like with any technology, it's important to find a balance between utilizing it and ensuring it doesn't become overly dominant or pose risks to our well-being. 

overall, it's essential that we approach the development and integration of ai with consideration for the potential risks and benefits it poses to society. this includes continual discussions around the role of ai in society and the limits on its development and deployment.
